subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the origin of the Rathore Dynasty?
explanation_en: The Rathore Dynasty originated from Jodhpur, Rajasthan. Their founder, Rao Jodha, established the city of Jodhpur and founded the Meera Clan of the Rathore Dynasty.

explanation_hi.subject: Rajasthan History
explanation_hi.topic: Raja Ravi Verma ki Vyaktitva aur Rajasthan ka Ghotana
explanation_hi.question_en: What was the character and governance of Raja Ravi Verma?
explanation_hi.question_hi: राजा रावी वर्मा का विश्वर्मा और राजधान
explanation_hi.explanation_en: Raja Ravi Verma was a valiant warrior king who played a significant role in the defense of Rajasthan during the Mughal invasion. He was known for his loyalty to the Chauhan Dynasty and ruled the region from the city of Jaipur.
